content: The Bamboo Grove is the second main region of Chapter 1's Black Wind Mountain in Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide to the progressing through the grove and learning how to cultivate Spirits, accessing a secret realm, as well as how to defeat the many bosses of this area that include Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, Guangmou, and the Whiteclad Noble.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
The Bamboo Grove is the second main region of Chapter 1's Black Wind Mountain in Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide to the progressing through the grove and learning how to cultivate Spirits, accessing a secret realm, as well as how to defeat the many bosses of this area that include Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, Guangmou, and the Whiteclad Noble.
